function_call.name: classify_risks_framework
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Possibility of sars-cov-2 transmission through aerosols","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Transmission of sars-cov-2 and other contagious diseases through droplets and aerosolization in the built environment","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate filtration techniques for removing pathogens like sars-cov-2 from shared air environments.","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Impact of the sharing economy on infectious disease transmission in shared spaces such as coworking environments, homes, and transportation.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of proper handwashing and hygiene practices","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Close contact and spatial proximity with infected persons","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate use and handling of masks","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of implementation of social distancing measures in local communities","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate understanding and implementation of environmental precautions","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"The spread of sars-cov-2 through aerosolized water droplets from sink areas","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Ineffective handwashing and hand sanitizing protocols","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential for spread of sars-cov-2 in buildings due to viral particles associated with larger particles that can potentially penetrate high efficiency filters.","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Increasing outside air fractions may lead to increased energy consumption","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Not all air-handling systems have capacity to substantially increase outside air ratios","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"High airflow rates without increased outside air fraction can increase transmission potential of contagious diseases","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Higher rh decreases airborne dispersal of viral particles","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Higher humidity negatively impacts lipid-enveloped viruses through interactions with the polar membrane heads","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Changes in humidity impact susceptibility to infection and viral particle deposition in the respiratory tract","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Risk of overhumidification increasing the potential of mold growth","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increased rh may lead to increased buildup on filters, decreasing airflow","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Effectiveness of capturing viral particles is increased with increased rh, but may lead to overhumidification","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Close proximity in buildings may promote potential viral transfer from one residence to another.","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Insufficient understanding of the impact of natural light on sars-cov-2 indoors.","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Unexplored effects of daylight on indoor viruses and sars-cov-2 could lead to a lack of effective mitigation strategies.","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Spatial configurations designed to encourage social interactions may inadvertently enhance opportunities for transmission of viruses.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Limited options for social-distancing measures in health care facilities","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Cohousing patients with vastly different requirements","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Increase in the number of individuals contracting covid-19 and being exposed to sars-cov-2","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Changes required after original publication","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Viral particles too small for best filters","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Unclear acknowledgment of contributors","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Downloading from an unsecured website","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Transmission of sars-cov-2 virus through droplets and fomites","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Airborne spread of sars-cov-2 virus during aerosol-generating procedures","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Uncertain role of the faecal-oral route in sars-cov-2 transmission","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Environmental sampling conducted in an airborne infectious-disease zone in a hospital.","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use of bioaerosol samplers in a hospital environment can lead to potential aerosolized pathogen exposure.","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Inadequate cleaning and disinfection schedule","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Positive samples from isolation rooms indicate potential spread of the virus to other areas","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Contamination of hands during toilet usage","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Contamination and spread of viruses in the toilet area due to shared use by multiple patients, potentially leading to a higher risk of infection.","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Detection of positive samples in the toilet area and potential presence of sars-cov-2 in patient stool samples present an increased risk of viral spread in the built environment.","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Small number of collected air samples","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Non-standardized data collection and terminology","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Challenges of data sharing","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Timely generation and dissemination of data","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Contagious disease transmission through primary data collection and sharing","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Perception of science and research funding","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Possibility of incomplete data capture due to studies not using specified search terms","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential for transmission of covid-19 in the process of real-world evidence research","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"}]}
